name: 2nd Global Surgery and Anesthesia  Experts Meet
content: On behalf of the organizing committee, we cordially welcome all to participate in the 2nd Global Surgery and Anesthesia Experts Meet (Spectus Surgery 2024) During April 25-26, 2024 at Lasvegas, USA. Theme of the conference: “Strategies for Innovative Technologies in Surgery & Anesthesia” We hope to see a lively exchange between colleagues from every part of the world. Spectus Surgery 2024 provide a unique platform to bring together worldwide distinguished academicians in the field of Various Surgeons, Anaesthesiologists, Doctors, Medical Professionals, Surgical tool technicians, Pharmaceutical Industrialists, business professionals, scientists, industry researchers and scholars to exchange about growing research and technologies. Expert faculties will discuss the relevant progress in Surgery and will explore the latest trends to reduce the effects in the field of Surgery and Anesthesia. We look forward to seeing and welcoming you during April 25-26, 2024 We hope that the occasion will offer a great networking opportunity and help generate new ideas and practices in Surgery and Anaesthesia for the advancement of our field.
